TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TypeUsage extends System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataItem

Docs.summary: Describes a type and a set of facets for that type.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage CreateDateTimeOffsetTypeUsage (System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType primitiveType, Nullable<byte> precision);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage CreateDateTimeOffsetTypeUsage(class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType primitiveType, valuetype System.Nullable`1<unsigned int8> precision) cil managed

Docs.param: The simple type that defines the units of measurement of the offset.

The degree of granularity of the <xref:System.>DateTimeOffset in fractions of a second, based on the number of decimal places supported. For example a precision of 3 means the granularity supported is milliseconds.
Docs.summary: Creates a <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.DateTimeOffsetTypeUsage> object of the type that the parameters describe.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage CreateDateTimeTypeUsage (System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType primitiveType, Nullable<byte> precision);

Docs.param: The simple type that defines the units of measurement of the <xref:System.>DateTime object.

The degree of granularity of the <xref:System.>DateTimeOffset in fractions of a second, based on the number of decimal places supported. For example a precision of 3 means the granularity supported is milliseconds.
Docs.summary: Creates a <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.DateTimeTypeUsage> object of the type that the parameters describe.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage CreateDefaultTypeUsage (System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType edmType);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage CreateDefaultTypeUsage(class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType edmType) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType"> for which the <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage> object is created.
Docs.summary: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"> object with the specified conceptual model type.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"> object with the default facet values for the specified <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the [edmType](assetId:///edmType?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True) is a primitive type, such as `String`, `Decimal`, `Binary` or `DateTime`, this method invokes one of the corresponding methods declared in the <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage> class. Otherwise, it creates a <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage> object with the specified <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType> directly.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage CreateStringTypeUsage (System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType primitiveType, bool isUnicode, bool isFixedLength);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage CreateStringTypeUsage(class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType primitiveType, bool isUnicode, bool isFixedLength) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"> for which the <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage> object is created.
`true` to set the character-encoding standard of the string type to Unicode; otherwise, `false`.
`true` to set the length of the string type to fixed; otherwise, `false`
Docs.summary: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"> object to describe a string type by using the specified facet values and unbounded `MaxLength`.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"> object describing a string type by using the specified facet values and unbounded `MaxLength`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about the string types, see [String (EDM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/66035587-41f3-4c36-8be0-71b035700c82).

`true` to set the character-encoding standard of the string type to Unicode; otherwise, `false`.

`true` to set the length of the string type to fixed; otherwise, `false`.
Docs.summary: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"> object to describe a string type by using the specified facet values.
